Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsArrayContainingInAnyOrder
    As of release 2.1, replaced by ArrayMatching.
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsArrayContainingInOrder
    As of release 2.1, replaced by ArrayMatching.
    org.hamcrest.core.IsCollectionContaining
    As of release 2.1, replaced by IsIterableContaining.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher._dont_implement_Matcher___instead_extend_BaseMatcher_()
    org.hamcrest.Matcher._dont_implement_Matcher___instead_extend_BaseMatcher_()
    to make
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsArrayContainingInOrder.arrayContaining(E...)
    As of version 2.1, use ArrayMatching.arrayContaining(Object[]).
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsArrayContainingInOrder.arrayContaining(List<Matcher<? super E>>)
    As of version 2.1, use ArrayMatching.arrayContaining(List).
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsArrayContainingInOrder.arrayContaining(Matcher<? super E>...)
    As of version 2.1, use ArrayMatching.arrayContaining(Matcher[]).
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsArrayContainingInAnyOrder.arrayContainingInAnyOrder(Collection<Matcher<? super E>>)
    As of version 2.1, use ArrayMatching.arrayContainingInAnyOrder(Collection).
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsArrayContainingInAnyOrder.arrayContainingInAnyOrder(E...)
    As of version 2.1, use ArrayMatching.arrayContainingInAnyOrder(Object[]).
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsArrayContainingInAnyOrder.arrayContainingInAnyOrder(Matcher<? super E>...)
    As of version 2.1, use ArrayMatching.arrayContainingInAnyOrder(Matcher[]).
    org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalToIgnoringWhiteSpace(String)
    Matchers.equalToCompressingWhiteSpace(String)
    org.hamcrest.text.IsEqualCompressingWhiteSpace.equalToIgnoringWhiteSpace(String)
    IsEqualCompressingWhiteSpace.equalToCompressingWhiteSpace(String)
    org.hamcrest.core.IsCollectionContaining.hasItem(Matcher<? super T>)
    As of version 2.1, use IsIterableContaining.hasItem(Matcher).
    org.hamcrest.core.IsCollectionContaining.hasItem(T)
    As of version 2.1, use IsIterableContaining.hasItem(Object).
    org.hamcrest.core.IsCollectionContaining.hasItems(Matcher<? super T>...)
    As of version 2.1, use IsIterableContaining.hasItems(Matcher[])}.
    org.hamcrest.core.IsCollectionContaining.hasItems(T...)
    As of version 2.1, use IsIterableContaining.hasItems(Object[])}.
    org.hamcrest.Matchers.isEmptyOrNullString()
    use is(emptyOrNullString()) instead
    org.hamcrest.text.IsEmptyString.isEmptyOrNullString()
    use is(emptyOrNullString()) instead
    org.hamcrest.Matchers.isEmptyString()
    use is(emptyString()) instead
    org.hamcrest.text.IsEmptyString.isEmptyString()
    use is(emptyString()) instead
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsIn.isIn(Collection<T>)
    use is(in(...)) instead
    org.hamcrest.Matchers.isIn(Collection<T>)
    use is(in(...)) instead
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsIn.isIn(T[])
    use is(in(...)) instead
    org.hamcrest.Matchers.isIn(T[])
    use is(in(...)) instead
    org.hamcrest.collection.IsIn.isOneOf(T...)
    use is(oneOf(...)) instead
    org.hamcrest.Matchers.isOneOf(T...)
    use is(oneOf(...)) instead
